group_1.narration: Learning the truth about Magical Girls@was such a shock...!@But now knowing what the two of them were dealing with,@Rena might have felt relieved, somewhere beneath it all.
I thought that from now on, Rena, Kaede, and@Momoko could bear these feelings together.
Sharing worries did help me understand myself@and the others better,
but what Rena could see was only a small part of it,@and there was still so much more she didn't know.
...That's why things ended up the way they did.
It's pointless to think about it now, but sometimes@I can't help but wonder... If Rena'd just known more,@could things have turned out differently?
